settings.description: Motion timeout delay (amount of time before sensor sends NO MOTION command back to controller or group 2, 5-600 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds

settings.description: Value sent with BASIC SET to group 2 when motion is detected (0=0ff, 1-99=level, 255=ON)
settings.label: Level

settings.description: If ambient light mode is enabled, and the LUX level is under this level, a BASIC SET will be sent to group 2 when motion is detected (5-1000 lux)
settings.label: Lux

settings.description: Retrigger interval. Motion detected commands are delayed by this value (1-8 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds

settings.description: Light sensing interval. Time between successive ambient light level reports (60-36000 seconds)
settings.label: Seconds

settings.description: Enable/Disable ambient light mode, report LUX value to group 2
settings.label: Mode

settings.description: Minumum LUX change in order to report a LUX level to controller (0-255 in LUX)
settings.label: Lux Change

settings.description: Enable/Disable LED, if enabled, LED will flash when motion is detected
settings.label: Mode
